thread.title: Two night stay was exceptional!
thread.title_full: Two night stay was exceptional! - Review of Hilton Beijing Wangfujing, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: lauriez
title: Two night stay was exceptional!
text: This is one of my favorite hiltons in the world. We are Hilton diamond so we were upgraded to am amazing suite, paying less than $200 a night. The executive lounge, fitness center and staff were exceptional. Great location near forbidden city. Below are photos of our balcony view and a picture of the closet. Best hotel closet for the money EVER!
